message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget allows me to spend up to $800000. I hope we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $800000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to consider a compromise. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
